565250.name: Tales of Berseria™ - Adventure Item Pack 5
565250.description:
Catalog 5 gift: Set of item for adventurer containing the following enhancement goods:

• Adamantine Fragment x 10
• Void Scrap x 10
• Funky Fluid x 10
• Fine Tempering Powder x 10
• Odorless Fluid x 10
• Amber Fragment x 10
• Calcite Fragment x 10
• Fluorite Fragment x 10
• Amphibole Fragment x 10
• Feldspar Fragment x 10
• Quartz Fragment x 10
• Topaz Fragment x 10
• Mythril Fragment x 10
• Adamantine Fragment x 10
• Bronze Scrap x 10
• Silver Scrap x 10
• Gold Scrap x 10
• Platinum Scrap x 10
• Void Scrap x 10
• Odorless Fluid x 10
• Balmy Fluid x 10
• Mellow Fluid x 10
• Pungent Fluid x 10
• Funky Fluid x 10
• Coarse Tempering Powder x 10
• Standard Tempering Powder x 10
• Fine Tempering Powder x 10

英语*, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语
